targets.expr: sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{namespace=~"$namespace"}[2m]))

sum by (namespace, ingress, service, status, status_text, severity) (

  label_replace(
    label_replace(
      rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{namespace=~"$namespace", service=~"$service", status=~"5.."}[5m]),
      "status_text", "SERVER ERROR", "status", ".*"
    ),
    "severity", "1", "status", ".*"
  )

  or

  label_replace(
    label_replace(
      rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{namespace=~"$namespace", service=~"$service",status=~"4.."}[5m]),
      "status_text", "CLIENT ERROR", "status", ".*"
    ),
    "severity", "2", "status", ".*"
  )

  or

  label_replace(
    label_replace(
      rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{namespace=~"$namespace",service=~"$service", status=~"3.."}[5m]),
      "status_text", "REDIRECT", "status", ".*"
    ),
    "severity", "3", "status", ".*"
  )

  or

  label_replace(
    label_replace(
      rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{namespace=~"$namespace",service=~"$service", status=~"2.."}[5m]),
      "status_text", "OK", "status", ".*"
    ),
    "severity", "4", "status", ".*"
  )
)
kube_ingress_path{namespace=~"$namespace", service_name=~"$service"}
kube_ingress_info{namespace=~"$namespace",ingress=~"^$service.*"}
kube_service_info{namespace=~"$namespace", service=~"$service"}
